title: Anne of Green Gables
description: Once there was a little house called Green Gables in a little town called Avonlea, on a little island off the coast of Canada. It was the prettiest, most perfect place in the whole world -at least Anne thought so, the first time she saw it. And just think, it was to be her new home! Or was it? "There's been a terrible mistake," said the last on the porch when she saw the skinny little red-headed girl carrying a suitcase. "A mistake?" Anne gulped. " You're a girl! " the lady said. "We asked the orphanage to send us a boy." Anne dropped her suitcase and burst into tears. " I might have known, " she cried. "Nobody ever did want me! I might have known it was all too beautiful to last!" *taken from the back cover
author: L.M. Montgomery
